action: Set thermostat hold for X hours
action_description: This action will set the thermostat into a hold with the specified temperature for the specified number of hours.
This action turns off one of your light switches.
This Action will create a vacation event on the selected thermostat with the specified setpoint. The vacation event will begin immediately and last the number of specified days.
This action turns on one of your light switches.
This action will set the thermostat into an indefinite hold with the specified temperature.

action: Set thermostat comfort profile until next transition
action_description: This Action will set the thermostat into a hold using the settings from the specified comfort profile. This comfort profile hold will remain in effect until the next next comfort profile transition in the program.

action: Set thermostat hold until next transition
action_description: This action will set the thermostat into a hold with the specified temperature and the end date/time will be set to the next climate transition in the program.

action: Set thermostat comfort profile for X hours
action_description: This Action will set the thermostat into a hold using the settings from the specified comfort profile. This comfort profile hold will remain in effect for the specified number of hours.
This Action removes the currently running event on the selected thermostat providing the event is not a mandatory demand response event.
